page.shortlink: api inet namespace ssl context class create certificate request method
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = CreateCertificateRequest(CertificateFile as C, PrivateKeyFile as C, PrivateKeyPassword as C [, CountryCode = "US" as C [, State = "MA" as C [, Locality = "Burlington" as C [, Organization = "Alpha Software Customer" as C [, OrganizationalUnit = "Development Test" as C [, CommonName = "www.mydomain.com" as C [, EMail = "" as C ]]]]]]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: CertificateFile
argument.description: The path and name of the certificate file.

argument.name: PrivateKeyFile
argument.description: The path and name of the private key file.

argument.name: PrivateKeyPassword
argument.description: The password for the private key file.

argument.name: CommonName = "www.mydomain.com"
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Server Test Certificate". You can provide multiple names as a CRLF delimited string.

page.description: Create a reqest for a certificate.
page.discussion: The INET::SSLContext::CreateCertificateRequest() method creates a request for a SSL Server Certificate.
page.example: dim ctx as INET::SSLContext if ctx.CreateCertificateRequest(RequestFile, KeyFile, Password, "US", "MA", "Burlington", "Alpha Software, Inc.", "Dev", "Dev Test Request") Result = "Request successfully created" else Result = "Error creating certificate request: " + ctx.callresult.text end if ui_msg_box("Create certificate request: " + RequestFile, Result)
